hedline.hl1: H & M Opens at Palisades Center

abstract.p: Swedish-based retailer H & M opens apparel store in Palisades Center in Nyack, NY; logo (S)

block.p: Consumers of the cheap-chic fashions promoted by the 52-year-old Swedish-based retailer H & M, have been able to indulge at its recently opened store in the Palisades Center in Nyack. Other American locations include a branch on Fifth Avenue and one in the Garden State Mall in New Jersey.
Combining a mix that blends Target's knowing design panache with compatriot Ikea's easily negotiated layout, H&M has 613 stores in 14 countries.

Consumers of the cheap-chic fashions promoted by the 52-year-old Swedish-based retailer H & M, have been able to indulge at its recently opened store in the Palisades Center in Nyack. Other American locations include a branch on Fifth Avenue and one in the Garden State Mall in New Jersey.
Combining a mix that blends Target's knowing design panache with compatriot Ikea's easily negotiated layout, H&M has 613 stores in 14 countries.

With a sharply defined focus on runway trends and street-wise looks, the stores appeal to shoppers who want the latest fashion, accessories and cosmetics at flea-market prices, like men's cotton shirts for $9, women's tank tops for under $6 and fringed suede bags for $9.
''The merchandise is also so trendy that one thing all clients have for sure in common is that they are fashion oriented,'' a spokeswoman for H & M said.
